title: Sex And Presents
description: Dancer and sometimes rentboy Aoi wants to share a special Christmas with his lover, fox-shifter Itsuki. He's not sure if what he has planned will please his kitsune, considering that he's never been good at the whole monogamy game. Aoi hopes everything works out, but can he and Itsuki overcome his past?
author: Misa Izanaki
